summary: This document is a DNA analysis report from ABC Forensic Services Laboratory for Bramblewood County Sheriff's Office case B2022-16584. DNA profiles were obtained from various evidence items, and comparisons were made with reference samples from individuals. Kathy Poindexter is included as a possible contributor to certain DNA profiles, while others are excluded.
conclusion: Kathy Poindexter is included as a possible contributor to the DNA profile obtained from BCSO-3.2, BCSO-5.1, and BCSO-6.2. Gerald Gillespie is included as a possible contributor to the mixture DNA profile from BCSO-5.2. CODIS eligible profile was obtained from BCSO-3.1 and entered into CODIS.

people.name: Gerald Gillespie
people.relevance: Reference sample, possible contributor to mixture DNA profile

people.relevance: Reference sample, possible contributor to DNA profile
